Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.transform.image.StaticImageTransform

  • Packages that use StaticImageTransform 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.canvas  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection  
    com.defano.jmonet.transform.image  

    • Uses of StaticImageTransform in com.defano.jmonet.canvas

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.canvas with parameters of type StaticImageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JMonetCanvas.transform(StaticImageTransform transform)
      Performs a transformation on the image that does not effect the dimensions, bounds or location of the affected image.

    • Uses of StaticImageTransform in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection with parameters of type StaticImageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void TransformableImageSelection.transform(StaticImageTransform transform)
      Performs a transformation on the selected image that does not effect the dimensions, bounds or location of the selection.

    • Uses of StaticImageTransform in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image that implement StaticImageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApplyPixelTransform
      Applies a PixelTransform to every pixel of a given image that's contained within a masking shape.
      class  BufferedImageOpTransform
      Transforms an image by applying a BufferedImageOp to it.
      class  ColorReductionTransform
      Converts the color space of an image to a reduced palette containing no more than a specified number of colors.
      class  ConvolutionTransform
      Convolves an image by applying an image Kernel to each pixel.
      class  FillTransform
      Fills every transparent pixel of an image that lies within a given mask with a specified paint or texture.
      class  GreyscaleReductionTransform
      Transform an image to a gray-scale containing no more than the specified number of gray shades.
      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.transform.image with parameters of type StaticImageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StaticImageTransformable.transform(StaticImageTransform transform)
      Performs a transformation on the image that does not effect the dimensions, bounds or location of the affected image.
